privacyPolicyScreen.title: Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: This Privacy Policy sets out how the app Lunari uses and protects your personal data that you generate and store within the app.

dataUse.title: Data Use
dataUse.descriptionPrefix: Lunari respects and celebrates your privacy. There is no collection of usage data or personal information, no ads, no spyware. Lunari can store data related to your menstrual heatlh
dataUse.usage: This data is used solely to provide you with period predictions, cycle insights, and personalized tracking features. We do not share, sell, or transmit your personal health data to any third parties.
dataUse.deletion: If you wish to delete all your app data, you can do so by going to the settings menu and selecting "Delete data". This can also be done by uninstalling the app.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: Lunari may request the following permissions:
permissions.remindersSuffix: : To send you period reminders and cycle predictions.
permissions.biometricSuffix: : To secure your app with fingerprint or face recognition (optional).
permissions.revoke: If you don't want to use any of these permissions, you can revoke them at any time through your device settings.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in complete transparency about how your data is handled:
transparency.localStorage: • All your data is stored locally on your device
transparency.noTransmission: • No data is transmitted to external servers
transparency.deleteAnytime: • You can delete all your data at any time
transparency.noAnalytics: • We do not use analytics or tracking services
transparency.noAds: • No third-party advertising or data collection
transparency.control: You have full control over your data. You can delete all tracking data through the settings menu, and the app will continue to work normally without any stored information.

privacyPolicyScreen.footer: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at lunari.appmail@gmail.app.
